    About me

    I am a MSc student in Computer Science at ETH Zurich currently working on data marketplaces and data valuation with David Dao, advised by Prof. Dr. Ce Zhang. In my research I explore how we can value data and create data marketplaces when data contributors may exhibit adversarial behavior.

    Previously, I completed my BSc in Computer Science at University of Copenhagen and researched sustainability and resource efficiency of machine learning, supervised by Prof. Dr. Raghav Selvan. I have also worked as a software developer at Nykredit.
